name: data_mode
description: Delayed mode or real time data

name: gdir
description: Wind from direction (gust) in the atmosphere

name: hcdt
description: Current to direction relative true north

name: tair2m
description: Air temperature at 2 meters height above sea level

name: vtpk
description: Wave period at spectral peak / peak period (Tp)

name: wdir
description: Wind from direction relative true north

name: x_wind10
description: Wind speed along East-West direction at 10 meters above Sea Level

name: y_wind10
description: Wind speed along North-South direction at 10 meters above Sea Level

name: ice_concentration
description: FMI ice chart sea ice concentration

name: ice_thickness
description: FMI ice chart sea ice thickness in cm

name: googlemaps_x
description: spherical mercator - google maps - x staggered

name: googlemaps_y
description: spherical mercator - google maps - y staggered

name: vped
description: Wave principal direction at spectral peak

name: vhm0_sw2
description: Spectral significant secondary swell wave height

name: vhm0_sw1
description: Spectral significant primary swell wave height

name: vmdr_sw2
description: Mean secondary swell wave direction from

name: vmdr_sw1
description: Mean primary swell wave direction from

name: wdpa_pid
description: Parcel ID. Parcel ID’s are used when in a same protected area different zones have been formally defined and delineated

name: pa_def
description: The IUCN Definition attribute indicates whether the site meets the following definition of a protected area

name: orig_name
description: The name of the protected area in any language supported by UTF 8 encoding

name: desig
description: The name of the designation of the protected areas in the native language

name: desig_eng
description: The name of the designation of the protected area in English

name: desig_type
description: The designation type is the category or type of protected area as legally/officially designated or proposed

name: int_crit
description: This field is only applied to the UNESCO World Heritage natural sites and Ramsar sites

name: marine
description: This field describes whether a protected area falls totally or partially, within the marine environment

name: rep_m_area
description: The reported marine area details the extent of the protected area in square kilometers provided by data provider if the ‘Marine’ field is ‘1’ or ‘2’

name: gis_m_area
description: Protected area marine extent in square kilometers calculated by UNEP-WCMC

name: rep_area
description: The Reported Area is the total protected area extent, including both marine (if applicable) and terrestrial areas, in square kilometers provided by data provider as specified in the legal text for the site

name: gis_area
description: Protected area total extent, including both marine (if applicable) and terrestrial areas, in square kilometers calculated by UNEP-WCMC projecting the protected area polygon in the standard Mollweide projection and using GIS software tools

name: no_take
description: No take means that the taking of living or dead natural resources, inclusive of all methods of fishing, extraction, dumping, dredging and construction, is strictly prohibited in all or part of a marine protected area

name: no_tk_area
description: The no take area is the total extent of the area in square kilometers where the taking of living or dead natural resources is prohibited, as reported to UNEP-WCMC by the data provider

name: status
description: All protected areas in the WDPA are either listed as ‘Designated’, ‘Proposed’ or ‘Established’. Protected areas that have been degazetted are not included within the WDPA

name: status_yr
description: The year in which the protected area was proposed (if Status is listed as ‘Proposed’), designated (if Status is listed as ‘Designated’) or established (if Status is listed as ‘Established’)

name: gov_type
description: Governance is a description of the decision-making structure of a protected area and should describe where the decision-making power of delegating management authority rests

name: own_type
description: Ownership type is often independent of governance and management structures

name: mang_auth
description: The management authority is the agency, organization, individual or group that manages the protected area

name: metadataid
description: The metadata ID is the number that links the WDPA attribute table with the WDPA Source table

name: parent_iso3
description: The ParentISO3 code is the country that a protected area jurisdictionally resides within, as given by its ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code

name: main_port_name
description: Ports are grouped according to country and locality, and are listed in geographic sequence

name: chart
description: The number of the best-scale chart issued by the National \nGeospatial-Intelligence Agency is listed with no prefix

name: harbor_size_code
description: The classification of harbor size based on several applicable factors, including area, facilities, and wharf space.

name: harbor_type_code
description: Principal water area of the port

name: shelter_afforded_code
description: The shelter afforded from wind, sea, and swell, refers to the area\nwhere normal port operations are conducted, usually the wharf area

name: entrance_restriction_tide
description: Indicates if tide is restricting entrance to the port

name: entrance_restriction_swell
description: Indicates if swell is restricting entrance to the port

name: entrance_restriction_ice
description: Indicates if ice is restricting entrance to the port

name: entrance_restriction_other
description: Indicates if there are any other factors  restricting entrance to the port

name: overhead_limits
description: Indicates that bridge and overhead power cables exist

name: channel_depth
description: The controlling depth of the principal or deepest channel

name: anchorage_depth
description: The depth in the anchorage is the least depth in the best or principal anchorage

name: cargo_pier_depth
description: The greatest depth at chart datum alongside the respective wharf/pier

name: oil_terminal_depth
description: The greatest depth at chart datum

name: maxsize_vessel_code
description: “L” indicates that a ship of over 500 feet (152.4 meters) long may be accommodated. “M” indicates ships less than 500 feet (152.4 meters) long may be accommodated

name: good_holding_ground
description: This is indicated only where actual anchorage conditions have been reported.

name: turning_area
description: An indication that a turning basin or other water area for turning vessels is available in the port.

name: first_port_of_entry
description: A port where a vessel may enter and clear foreign goods and personnel through Customs and Immigration

name: us_representative
description: Indicates whether the United States maintains civilian/military representation in that port.

name: eta_message
description: Indicates whether an ETA message is required for that port.

name: pilotage_compulsory
description: The necessity or advisability of taking a pilot

name: pilotage_available
description: The necessity or advisability of taking a pilot

name: pilotage_local_assist
description: The necessity or advisability of taking a pilot

name: pilotage_advisable
description: The necessity or advisability of taking a pilot

name: tugs_salvage
description: Indicates whether tugs are available for docking or anchorage assistance

name: tugs_assist
description: Indicates whether tugs are available for docking or anchorage assistance

name: quarantine_pratique
description: Quarantine type for ships arriving from overseas

name: quarantine_deratt_cert
description: Quarantine type for ships arriving from overseas

name: quarantine_other
description: Quarantine type for ships arriving from overseas

name: communications_telephone
description: Indicates if this type of communication is available in the port and/or nearby area

name: communications_telegraph
description: Indicates if this type of communication is available in the port and/or nearby area

name: communications_radio
description: Indicates if this type of communication is available in the port and/or nearby area

name: communications_radio_tel
description: Indicates if this type of communication is available in the port and/or nearby area

name: communications_air
description: Indicates if this type of communication is available in the port and/or nearby area

name: communications_rail
description: Indicates if this type of communication is available in the port and/or nearby area

name: load_offload_wharves
description: Refers to the area where normal port operations are conducted

name: load_offload_anchor
description: Refers to the area where normal port operations are conducted

name: load_offload_med_moor
description: Refers to the area where normal port operations are conducted

name: load_offload_beach_moor
description: Refers to the area where normal port operations are conducted

name: load_offload_ice_moor
description: Refers to the area where normal port operations are conducted

name: medical_facilities
description: An indication that there is some form of medical facilities in the port that will accommodate seamen

name: garbage_disposal
description: Indicates whether garbage can be disposed of at the pier or by lighters at the anchorage or mooring.

name: degauss
description: Indicates whether degaussing facilities are available

name: dirty_ballast
description: Pertains to a port that has sufficient facilities for receiving oily and/or chemically contaminated dirty ballast.

name: services_longshore
description: Indicates whether this kind of port service is available

name: services_elect
description: Indicates whether this kind of port service is available

name: services_steam
description: Indicates whether this kind of port service is available

name: services_navig_equip
description: Indicates whether this kind of port service is available

name: services_elect_repair
description: Indicates whether this kind of port service is available

name: supplies_provisions
description: The availability of provisions in the port

name: supplies_water
description: The availability of water in the port

name: supplies_fuel_oil
description: The availability of fuel oil in the port

name: supplies_diesel_oil
description: The availability of diesel oil in the port

name: supplies_deck
description: The availability of deck supplies in the port

name: supplies_engine
description: The availability of engine supplies in the port

name: repair_code
description: Repairs that can be made to ocean-going vessels

name: drydock
description: The general size and type of the largest underwater repair facilities in the port

name: railway
description: The general size and type of the largest underwater repair facilities in the port

name: leg
description: leg of the voyage  i.e. Whether the vessel is in  LADEN or in  BALLAST condition

name: sea condition
description: Condition of the sea and the swell

name: slow speed duration
description: Streaming time run at SLOW SPEED

name: slow speed distance
description: Streaming distance run at SLOW SPEED

name: full speed duration
description: Streaming time run at FULL SPEED

name: full speed distance
description: Streaming distance run at FULL SPEED

name: hours (+/-)
description: Time changes from setting the clock forward or backward with +(plus) for forward movements and – (minus) for backward movements

name: slip
description: Slip is considered as the difference between the speed of the engine and actual speed of the ship

name: average speed
description: Average speed for the distance covered from the previous noon or from FULLAWAY

name: average rpm
description: Average number of revolutions per minute or indication of the propeller

name: dtg
description: The remaining distance from the noon position to the destination port

name: csp
description: Speed used to calculate the estimated time of arrival at the next port

name: engine fuel consumption
description: Consumption of fuel exclusively for the operation of the main engine.

name: engine diesel consumption
description: Consumption of diesel oil exclusively for the operation of the main engine.

name: stop/slow downs – engine fuel
description: Consumption of fuel oil in the main engine, during stoppage or slow down

name: stop/slow downs – engine diesel
description: Consumption of diesel oil in the main engine, during stoppage or slow down

name: lubricants – engine
description: R.O.B (remaining on board) lubricants for the engine

name: lubricants – cylinder
description: R.O.B (remaining on board) lubricants for the cylinder

name: lubricants – generator
description: R.O.B (remaining on board) lubricants for the generator

name: lubricants – evaporator
description: R.O.B (remaining on board) lubricants for the evaporator

name: eta date
description: Estimated date and time of arrival at the destination port followed by the speed under which the estimation has been made

name: inward moves (consumptions) – miles
description: Distance in miles referred to vessel's movement from STAND BY (seabuoy) to BERTH

name: inward moves (consumptions) – duration
description: Duration of movement in minutes and hours referred to vessel's movement from STAND BY (seabuoy) to BERTH

name: inward moves (consumptions) – engine fuel oil
description: Consumption of fuel oil in the main engine referred to vessel's movement from STAND BY (seabuoy) to BERTH

name: inward moves (consumptions) – engine diesel oil
description: Consumption of diesel oil in the main engine referred to vessel's movement from STAND BY (seabuoy) to BERTH

name: cruising (consumptions) – miles
description: Distance run in miles, in any case where the vessel cannot stay at anchor and is obliged to cruise

name: cruising (consumptions) – duration
description: Trip duration in hours and minutes, in any case where the vessel cannot stay at anchor and is obliged to cruise

name: cruising (consumptions) – engine fuel oil
description: Consumption of fuel oil in the main engine, in any case where the vessel cannot stay at anchor and is obliged to cruise

name: cruising (consumptions) – engine diesel oil
description: Consumption of diesel oil in the main engine, in any case where the vessel cannot stay at anchor and is obliged to cruise

name: at anchor (consumptions) – duration
description: Time of a vessel waiting at anchor

name: at anchor (consumptions) – engine fuel oil
description: Consumption of fuel oil in the main engine, of a vessel waiting at anchor

name: at anchor (consumptions) – engine diesel oil
description: Consumption of diesel oil in the main engine, of a vessel waiting at anchor

name: out movement (consumptions) – miles
description: Distance in miles, referred to vessel's movement from BERTH to STAND BY (seabuoy)

name: out movement (consumptions) – duration
description: Duration of movement in minutes and hours, referred to vessel's movement from BERTH to STAND BY (seabuoy)

name: out movement (consumptions) – engine fuel oil
description: Consumption of fuel oil in the main engine, referred to vessel's movement from BERTH to STAND BY (seabuoy)

name: out movement (consumptions) – engine diesel oil
description: Consumption of diesel oil in the main engine, referred to vessel's movement from BERTH to STAND BY (seabuoy)

name: shifting (consumptions) – miles
description: Distance in miles, referred to vessel's movement from BERTH TO BERTH or BERTH TO ANCHORAGE and vise-versa

name: shifting (consumptions) – duration
description: Duration of movement in minutes and hours, referred to vessel's movement from BERTH TO BERTH or BERTH TO ANCHORAGE and vise-versa

name: shifting (consumptions) – engine fuel oil
description: Consumption of fuel oil in the main engine, referred to vessel's movement from BERTH TO BERTH or BERTH TO ANCHORAGE and vise-versa

name: shifting (consumptions) – engine diesel oil
description: Consumption of diesel oil in the main engine, referred to vessel's movement from BERTH TO BERTH or BERTH TO ANCHORAGE and vise-versa

name: at berth (consumptions) – duration
description: Time of vessel's stay AT BERTH in hours and minutes

name: rob – engine oil
description: R.O.B (remaining on board) oil for the engine
